comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content:
June 3, 1914: Commencement Day at Barnard College (women's affiliate of Columbia University), New York City.

comment.author: 68139759@N03
comment._content: I cried when I saw this photo. Here I am, a Barnard girl who graduated 97 years after this picture was taken on the same spot.
